ai-tha-ap30:1.1_0: “One from the bank of the river,
ai-tha-ap30:1.3_0: wandering along the roam of your territory.
ai-tha-ap30:2.4_0: I didn’t go to see them.
ai-tha-ap30:3.2_0: I went to that same place
ai-tha-ap30:3.3_0: Having gone to the Awakened One
ai-tha-ap30:4.2_0: they’ll take care of the Buddha!
ai-tha-ap30:5.3_0: My mind is serene with a thought
ai-tha-ap30:5.4_0: on the bank of the world,
ai-tha-ap30:6.1_0: on the bank of the river,
ai-tha-ap30:7.2_0: I went to the realm of the gods,
ai-tha-ap30:7.3_0: I rejoice in the heavenly realm.
ai-tha-ap30:8.1_0: Queen Sattuka, the lord of the gods,
ai-tha-ap30:9.4_0: in the teaching of the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap30:10.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap30:10.2_0: in any place where there was nothing through.
ai-tha-ap30:10.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap30:10.4_0: This is the fruit of refuge.
ai-tha-ap30:11.3_0: I’ve realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap30:12.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Uttiya.
ai-tha-ap30:13.1_0: the eighth of the Elder Uttiya,
